00063     TValue operator()(const TPoint &aPoint) throw( std::bad_alloc )
00064     {
00065         Iterator it = this->find( aPoint );
00066         if ( it == this->end() )
00067             throw std::bad_alloc();
00068         else
00069             return this->operator[]( aPoint );
00070     }
00071 
00072 
00073     TValue operator()(const Iterator &it) throw( std::bad_alloc )
00074     {
00075         if ( it == this->end() )
00076             throw std::bad_alloc();
00077         else
00078             return (*it).second;
00079     }
